data.eml:eml: A new species of Neoperla from China, with a redescription of the female of N. mnong Stark, 1987 (Plecoptera, Perlidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Zhi-Teng, Du, Yu-Zhou (2016): A new species of Neoperla from China, with a redescription of the female of N. mnong Stark, 1987 (Plecoptera, Perlidae). ZooKeys 616: 103-113, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.616.8996, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.616.8996
